com.yolanda.nohttp

类 ByteArrayBinary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yolanda.nohttp.BasicBinary
      • com.yolanda.nohttp.InputStreamBinary
        • com.yolanda.nohttp.ByteArrayBinary
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Cancelable, Finishable, Startable, Binary

    public class ByteArrayBinary
extends InputStreamBinary

    A default implementation of Binary. All the methods are called in Son thread.

    Created in Oct 17, 2015 12:40:54 PM.
    作者:
    Yan Zhenjie.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 com.yolanda.nohttp.InputStreamBinary

        inputStream

      A byte array of Binary.

      A byte array of Binary.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ByteArrayBinary

        public ByteArrayBinary(byte[] byteArray,
                       String fileName)
        A byte array of Binary.
        参数:
        byteArray - byte array.
        fileName - file name. Had better pass this value, unless the server tube don't care about the file name.

      • ByteArrayBinary

        public ByteArrayBinary(byte[] byteArray,
                       String fileName,
                       String mimeType)
        A byte array of Binary.
        参数:
        byteArray - byte array.
        fileName - file name. Had better pass this value, unless the server tube don't care about the file name.
        mimeType - content type.
